articles.title: Bruce MacVittie dead: The Sopranos and Law & Order actor dies in hospital at 65 - The Mirror
articles.description: The Sopranos and Law & Order star Bruce MacVittie has passed away in hospital at 65, his devastated wife has confirmed
articles.content:
Bruce MacVittie has passed away at the age of 65.
The sad passing of the much-loved The Sopranos and Law & Order actor was confirmed on Thursday by his grieving family.
